bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Halifax County was formed in 1752 from Lunenburg County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Halifax County (Va.) Answer and Deposition from the Chancery Cause, John Watkins vs. Executor of Micajah Watkins, 1804. Consists of the answer of James Watkins, Executor of Micajah Watkins, to a bill of complaint brought by John Watkins. The complaint concerns the settlement of the estate, particularly the division of the slave property in the estate.
Also included is a deposition of John Carmical regarding his witness of a bond made between Micajah Watkins and others and Anna Watkins in 1795.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Halifax (County) Court Records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm."

separatedmaterial.p: Additional documents related to this chancery suit can be found at Halifax County Courthouse Chancery Cause 1804-034.
